Package veslo

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    BeanValidationModel<DTO>
    An interface for checking JavaBean specification/contract compliance.
    BriefAssertionError.TruncationPredicate
    Predicate to abort the formation of a StackTrace (reduction)
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AllureAction
    Adds request/response attachments to the Allure step
    AllureCallAdapterFactory
    Factory for creating CallAdapter with support for Allure steps.
    AResponse<SUC_DTO,​ERR_DTO>
    Allure dual model response
    BeanValidationConfiguration  
    BooleanGsonTypeAdapter
    Convert 1/0 to boolean type
    GsonConverter<DTO>
    Gson converter
    GsonConverterFactory
    Gson DTO converter factory
    GsonTestClient
    Utility class for building an HTTP client with a built-in Gson converter
    JacksonConverter<DTO>
    Jackson 2 converter
    JacksonConverterFactory
    Jackson 2 DTO converter factory
    JacksonModelAdditionalProperties<DTO>
    Jackson model additional properties base class Allows you to handle the case when the response from the server contains extra fields without throwing an error when converting (unlike Gson).
    JacksonTestClient
    Utility class for building an HTTP client with a built-in Jackson2 converter
    Veslo4Test
    Utility class for building an HTTP client for testing
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    ContractViolationException  
    ConvertCallException  
    ConverterNotFoundException  
    ConverterUnsupportedTypeException  
    HttpCallException  
    PrimitiveConvertCallException  
    ReflectionException  
    RuntimeIOException  
    TemplateException  
    UtilityClassException  
  • Error Summary
    Error Description
    BriefAssertionError
    AssertionError with the ability to truncate StackTrace by BriefAssertionError.TruncationPredicate function.
  • Annotation Types Summary
    Annotation Type Description
    GsonModel
    The annotation applies only to the class and declares that the class is a Gson model.
    JacksonModel
    The annotation applies only to the class and declares that the class is a Jackson2 model.
